headings: Prepare for leadership roles in the global business community.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With an MBA Degree?
Why Earn My MBA Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Our 100% online MBA degree program offers a broad perspective and emphasizes organizational decision making to help you take your career to the next level. You will develop the knowledge and skills you need to move up to executive, administrative or management positions at businesses, public agencies or nonprofit organizations.

Our program is also structured so that you can complete your degree in as little as one year, and it has been ranked among the best, fastest and most affordable online MBA programs in Texas and the U.S. by multiple higher education resource guides.
The Norris-Vincent College of Business is accredited by AACSB International.
Our faculty bring real-world experience to the classroom and offer a global view of business, economics and finance. They are also dedicated to providing the best possible online learning experience.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.

Earning your online Master of Business Administration degree at Angelo State will give you the credentials you need to immediately advance your career in almost any corporate, public or private organization.

Over the last several years, our online MBA program has earned top national rankings for quality and affordability from respected publications like Fortune Magazine, as well as multiple online higher education guides, including Online MBA Coach and BestValueSchools.org. Also, our accreditation by AACSB International is a credential that is held by less than 6% of the world’s schools that offer business degree programs.

Upon completing the 10 courses to earn your MBA degree, you can also count the credits for six of those courses toward our MBA with Specialization in Healthcare Management or M.S. in Business Data Science and Analytics degree programs. That means you only have to take four additional courses to earn a second master’s degree.

If you are interested in adding an internship opportunity to your MBA degree plan, we have a dedicated internship advisor who is available to help set you up with the best possible internship situation that aligns with your educational and career goals. You can also gain additional practical experience by competing in our annual BizPitch student entrepreneurship contest.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.

“I have no doubt, had I not gone through the Angelo State business school myself, that I would be anywhere near where I am today. It’s an honor to own a San Angelo-based business and give back to the university who helped me grow into an entrepreneur. Knowing I can directly influence the next generation of business-owners is an incredible feeling.”

Blake Vincent, Class of 1996

“The professors are extremely focused on helping you succeed in the professional world. I have used multiple tools I learned in MBA courses in my day-to-day profession.”

Katherine Springer, Class of 2021, Master of Business Administration Program
